General.Name: Akb Primorye OAO
General.Description: Public joint-stock commercial bank Primorye provides commercial banking products and services to corporate and private customers in Russia. It offers deposit products; cash, car, housing, mortgage, and commercial loans; business financing, overdraft facility, and loan refinancing services; letter of credit and bank guarantee; and individual, salary, credit, and corporate cards. The company also provides western union transfer, settlement and cash, documentary collection, trade finance, foreign exchange control, correspondent banking, and financial management services; and currency purchase and sale, and hedging services. In addition, it offers mobile acquiring services; bank safes; securities brokerage and management; and Internet and mobile banking services. The company has branches in the cities of Ussuriisk, Nakhodka, Artem, and Wrangell, as well as in Khabarovsk, Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk, and Irkutsk; representative office in Magadan; and office in Moscow. Public joint-stock commercial bank Primorye was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Vladivostok, Russia.
